SummaryEnglish: The "Nyanbo" are creatures with square bodies with ears and tails that came to Earth from outer space.

1.TitleEnglish: The Cats That Came from the Stars
1.SummaryEnglish: Tora is hard at work looking for pieces of the Nyanbo's UFO again today - but the other Nyanbo just want to laze around, sharpen their claws, and act like cats.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tora and friends are searching for UFO pieces in the park when two flashy Nyanbo who dream of being idols, Sabatora and Kijitora, appear. Can the two of them help find the next piece of the UFO?

3.SummaryEnglish: Mike is always full of energy, but today he's a little too energetic and makes a mess of the Nyanbo's attic room. When the others yell at him, he starts to feel depressed.

4.SummaryEnglish: Shiro wants her beloved Tora so call her cute, so she tries her hardest to doll herself up and bake cute desserts for him.

5.SummaryEnglish: Tora wants to go out and look for UFO pieces, but Kotora has their friends wrapped around her little finger. Then they meet a mother cat with her kittens, and Kotora starts acting strange.

6.SummaryEnglish: Tora and the others are playing in the park when they notice a dark figure watching them. They follow it and find themselves face to face with some scary-looking Nyanbo. Are they friend or foe?

7.SummaryEnglish: Tora has found an unusual UFO piece, but he can't figure out how to use it. Then Blaze shows up and offers to help him.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tora and the other Nyanbo wonder why they behave so much like cats sometimes, and they decide to do some research on cats to find out. Will they find an answer?

9.SummaryEnglish: Tora encounters some strange-looking Nyanbo carrying away a UFO piece that he found. The strangers look a bit like robots. What is it they're trying to do?

10.SummaryEnglish: Tora is looking for a spiral-shaped UFO piece. His sister Kotora goes out to try to find it for him, but without much luck.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Mecha Nyanbo, led by Alpha, keep finding UFO pieces before Tora and his friends. Tora is getting anxious, so he asks the others for help, but it seems they don't see him as their leader.

12.SummaryEnglish: When Wild Black and the Mecha Nyanbo get into a fight over disputed turf, Tora jumps in to stop them with the suggestion of a soccer battle to settle the issue.

13.SummaryEnglish: Tora and Kotora are decorating the attic for a Christmas party. But as their friends arrive, they all seem to have the wrong idea about what Christmas is, so the party isn't getting very far.

14.SummaryEnglish: Mike is offended when Tora accuses him of having no stress in his life. He insists that there are others out there who have no stress, and goes out to town with Kotora to find them.

15.SummaryEnglish: Something that appears to be a microphone pops out of a UFO piece. Mike picks it up and suddenly wants to sing. Then the rest of the gang shows up, and the Nyanbo's singing contest is underway.

16.SummaryEnglish: Blaze insists to Shiro that he knows Kuro better than anyone else. But as he observes Kuro, he discovers more and more of his mysterious sides.

17.SummaryEnglish: Sabatora and Kijitora dream of becoming idols. They add Kotora and Shiro to their group, and the four of them begin training to become the #1 idols in the world.

18.SummaryEnglish: Alpha and the Mecha Nyanbo have come to the attic room where Tora and his friends live. He tells Tora that instead of fighting over UFO pieces, he wants to be friends and play nice from now on.

19.SummaryEnglish: Kotora loses the beloved teddy bear that the others gave to her. When Tora learns of this and scolds her, she runs from the house and ends up missing.

20.SummaryEnglish: A strange phenomenon has all the clocks in town running behind, and it seems to be caused by a UFO piece in the area. Tora, along with Alpha of the Mecha Nyanbo, rack their brains to solve its mysteries.

21.TitleEnglish: I Want to Go to School
21.SummaryEnglish: After listening to the others talk about what school is like, Kotora declares that she wants to try going to school. They begin a pretend school day, with each of the Nyanbo taking turns playing the teacher.

22.SummaryEnglish: Shiro is overjoyed to be on a picnic alone with Tora - but ends up disappointed when Mike, Kotora, and Kuro show up. Then she falls asleep and awakens to find that it's nighttime.

23.SummaryEnglish: Tora's UFO has been stolen by Alpha and his Mecha Nyanbo. To steal the final UFO piece, Alpha pilots the gigantic Big Omega and chases Tora and his friends all around town.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Nyanbos learn that when they scan an animal with the new UFO piece they just found, they can take the form of that animal. So they all take a trip to the zoo with the goal of becoming whichever animal they want.

25.SummaryEnglish: Tora is depressed after his UFO test flight failed. To try to cheer him up, Tora's friends ask for help from Alpha of the Mecha Nyanbo.

26.SummaryEnglish: The repairs on the UFO are complete, and Tora takes off toward outer space with Kotora, Mike, Shiro, and Kuro. Left behind on Earth, the other Nyanbo watch a recorded message from Tora with tears in their eyes.
